title: 求助求助！大佬们上场！
author: 岁月静好、
txt_content:
https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=971342&extra=page%3D1%26filter%3Dsortid%26sortid%3D7%26searchoption%5B62%5D%5Bvalue%5D%3D%25E7%25BB%2591%25E5%25AE%259A%26searchoption%5B62%5D%5Btype%5D%3D
关于这个插件的灵魂绑定的权限组有什么？
作者也没写= =

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
BoundSoul.used:
    default: true
  BoundSoul.admin:
    default: op

BoundSoul.used 玩家默认拥有。

BoundSoul.admin op 拥有

replies.author: 思念化作海
replies.txt_content:
应该是 BoundSoul.used  为什么不用MiaoBind呢?

https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-922072-1-1.html

更好一些(确信
